answers.answer: U don't want to get pregnancy diabetes don't u?It is not healthy for u or the baby hun:)
And cuz it has caffeine but I'm addicted to chocolate like people are with coffee my doc says we can eat it just not a whole lot
I dont want to have that.. But most of the time im craving to eat chocolate especially when i watch tv ads eating chocolates.
A little chocolate isn't gonna hurt you or the baby. Don't overdo it, but in moderation you'll be fine unless your doctor says otherwise

My ob knows I eat it all the time and she never mentioned once that is was bad for me. Just actually recommended it to me to gain weight I ate it like crazy with both of my pregnancies and didn't get diabetes and both babies were healthy!
Thanks mommies! Ideas i guess,, i always have chocolate in my meals.. Since we donr have family history of diabetes, im not afraid to eat alot .. Lol..
I eat so much chocolate its rediculous. Lol and I just passed my glucose test beauitfully. Ive been lime this my past 2 pregnancies too.  But thats just me.

title: Less chocolates OR Avoid chocolates during pregnancy?
